::Perceptor/male1/mle2/male3/femme1/femme2/7 bat-
probes/Blacknightmare/amazon squad/Drakfate::

Perceptor started shoot against Astral, while a male 1 was shootting 
gainst Fenox. One of the Femmes of Drgonfly's team shot her mchine 
gun at Recklessa while other Strted shoot ginst Starlight.


The bt-probes arrived and started shoot against Alliance's team while 
Blacknightmare was arriving she screamed at Kitkat "Look out, he 
want's kill you!!!!!"

The Amazon squad, that ws under the command of Blacknightmare shooted 
at avery bot that belong to Alliance.

And a repli-like shape was drwing in the sky.... and it had five 
heads... The shape screamed t his team "DESTROY ALLIANCE'S TEAM... 
i'LL GIVE A REWARD FOR EVERY SPARK THAT BELONGS TO ALLIACE THAT YOU 
TURN OFFF..."

The bots who belongs at Dragon's team roared plesed and renewed 
furiosly their battle against the alliance....

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Dark Lavacons/Dollen::
> 
>       The Dark Lavacons saw the preds ahead, and prepared for 
attack.
> 
>       "Ok, troops, ATTACK!!!  SHOW THE PREDACONS NO MERCY!" Astral 
commanded.
> 
>       Fenox began firing dark heat optic blasts at DrillBit.
> 
>       Recklessa landed, and fired her gatling guns madly at 
GoldenEye.
> 
>      "You show 'em your stuff Recklessa!!" yelled Starlight, who 
fired a shot from her darkflame crossbow at GoldenEye.
> 
>      Griplash stayed in the air, looking for the perfect target to 
slice open with his dark lava blade.
> 
>       Astral, still in the air, grabbed his darkflame rocket 
launcher, and fired one big blast down at KitKat.
> 
>       "Let's show them the power of the Allience!" Astral yelled 
with pride.
